Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2009 10:21PM bjsvaughn wrote: I just started that same regiment friday. I had one treatment of Taxotere & carboplatin and the nuelastin shot and that was awful. Was out of work for a week with dehydration and dizziness. Thus far this is much better. No nausea and just a little dizziness. Puffy eyes is the only thing I really have noticed... Otherwise feel much better than the 3 week regiment. Good luck... It is all scary!!!!
Posts.Title: paclitaxel weekly gonnabstrong unklezwifeonty
